name: Blast off (itch) (MjcPixel)
description:
This is the demo for the video game project I've been working on for about 6-7 months solo mostly.

This game is all about gameplay ! You play as an unnamed soldier who wakes up in an abandonned space station and proceeds to try escaping it.

This is a demo of the first 10 levels + Tutorial, hope you will enjoy it !
